snippet: The cat’s plight draws attention to its entire ecosystem.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Peter Zahler and George Schaller, officials at the Wildlife Conservations Society's Asia Program, describes how the focus on the plight of the endangered snow leopard has drawn attention to human communities in Asia that share its ecosystem; notes that the governments of all 12 snow leopard range countries have joined in a declaration to better protect the cat.

byline.original: By PETER ZAHLER and GEORGE SCHALLER

lead_paragraph: The cat’s plight draws attention to its entire ecosystem.

headline.main: Saving More Than Just Snow Leopards
headline.print_headline: Saving More Than Just Snow Leopards
